DOC.brief_summary: This investigator driven study examine safety , efficacy biological effect combine pembrolizumab ( MK-3475 ) antibody target anti-programmed cell death 1 ( PD-1 ) , stereotactic ablative body radiotherapy ( SABR ) oligometastatic renal cell carcinoma ( RCC ) . The investigator hypothesise safety profile combination clinically acceptable .
DOC.brief_title: Stereotactic Radiotherapy Anti-PD1 Antibody ( Pembrolizumab ) Oligometastatic Renal Tumours
